'''Abe''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the {{Quest|Through the Mists}}. He also appears as a spirit after the quest series is completed in the ruins between [[Shirikoro Peak]] and [[Chirai Shrine]].

==Location==
During the {{Quest|Through the Mists}}, Abe can be found on the left side of [[Moshiri Ceremonial Site]] speaking to [[Una]].

<gallery>
NPC Location Abe & Una.png|Abe's location
NPC Location Abe & Una Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

After the completion of the {{Quest|Through the Mists}}, Abe can be found as a ghostly figure underground near [[Chirai Shrine]].
<gallery>
NPC Location Abe.png|Abe's location
NPC Location Abe Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Trivia==
* "Abe" likely comes from the common Japanese surname, {{w|Abe (surname)|''Abe''}}.
* The Japanese name is actually {{ja|アペ|rm=Ape}}, which may derive from {{Lang|mini=1|ain=アペ|ain_rm=Ape}}, the Ainu word for "fire."
